messages.title: Nick Varley is Theresa May's Candidate
messages.content: Theresa May's candidate at the General Election in Tynemouth constituency will be Nick Varley. Together, they will get the best Brexit deal possible from the EU.

messages.title: Give Brexit Boost to Local Fishing
messages.content: North Shields fishing industry will receive a Brexit boost if Nick Varley is elected as Theresa May's Member of Parliament in Tynemouth. Nick was a senior pro-Brexit campaigner who will campaign for North Shields' fishing industry to thrive after we leave the European Union and the Common Fisheries policy.

messages.title: Don't Risk Voting for Corbyn's Candidate
messages.content: A vote for Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate here in Tynemouth will be claimed by Corbyn as backing for his wobbly and dangerous ideas.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in local schools and our NHS locally.
Get the best Brexit deal possible from the EU.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The choice at this General Election is between a Conservative government under Theresa May that delivers a strong and stable leadership in the national interest, or Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister in a coalition of chaos with the SNP and the anti-Brexit Liberal Democrats.

issues.brexitEurope: Get the best Brexit deal possible from the EU. North Shields fishing industry will receive a Brexit boost if Nick Varley is elected.
issues.government: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.

images.caption: Nick Varley is Theresa May's local candidate for Tynemouth constituency.

examples: North Shields fishing industry will receive a Brexit boost if Nick Varley is elected as Theresa May's Member of Parliament in Tynemouth.

The choice at this General Election is between a Conservative government under Theresa May that delivers a strong and stable leadership in the national interest, or Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister in a coalition of chaos with the SNP and the anti-Brexit Liberal Democrats.
Theresa May's candidate at the General Election in Tynemouth constituency will be Nick Varley.
A vote for Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate here in Tynemouth will be claimed by Corbyn as backing for his wobbly and dangerous ideas.

Speaking from the Promenade in Whitley Bay whilst out listening to the views of local residents Nick Varley said, 'So many residents in Tynemouth constituency have told me they think Theresa May is the person to bring the best deal home for us from the EU. Almost everyone thinks Jeremy Corbyn would be too dangerous to go through his dangerous ideas if given the keys to 10 Downing Street.'
Invest in local schools and our NHS locally.
